plot: Homer and Ned get sucked into the violent world of prestige TV when a ruthless debt collector comes to Springfield.

Ned finds a bag of money from a fallen tree trunk, he donates the money to the local orphanage. Homer becomes jealous over Ned's selfless act and he embarrasses himself at the winter fair in front of his family. At home, Marge angrily calls Homer out for being selfish and caring only about himself, she forces Homer to sleep on the couch. However, Homer is soon captured by Kostas Becker's henchmen, Seamus and Collette. Kostas demands the money Ned has taken.
